title: Thanksgiving Special: What Made The Turkey Trot To Boston?
description: On this special episode, we're going to listen to a story about how turkeys used to get from farms in Vermont to markets and dinner tables far away in Boston, a distance of a couple hundred miles. This was before refrigerated trucks. So how do you think they did it?
itunes:subtitle: On this special episode, we're going to listen to a story about how turkeys used to get from farms in Vermont to markets and dinner tables far away in Boston.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
itunes:author: Vermont Public Radio
